title: Saving the Lady's Honor
description: A broken heart and a love rejected, can a Montcrieff once fooled -- save his lady’s honor?   Jasper Montcrieff has loved Lady Rebecca Aston for as long as he can remember. They had an understanding, albeit a private one.  So why did Jasper hold hands with another woman? It was a slight that Rebecca could not take. To hide her distress she fled to France for two years – now she is back.  Can Jasper persuade her that his love is true?  When Rebecca attends the Witherton’s Autumn Ball, she is still badly hurt. She spurns Jasper once more but soon a handsome Captain is catching her eye. The newcomer has eyes only for Rebecca, but are his intentions honorable?  Can Jasper forget his heartbreak and save his lady’s honor?
author: Charlotte Darcy
